trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3AETHERFLOW_00524_SYSTEM_000_660<tab>The endless font of aether rising from Pagos far below continues into the skies high above...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3AETHERFLOW_00524_SYSTEM_000_661<tab>In mere moments, the treated magicite grows bright and warm, as it reacts to the torrential stream of aether, as Krile hoped it would...
